sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row no-gutters>
      <v-col cols="8" offset-md="2">
        <v-card height="600">
          <v-card-title>
            Clickable 2D Model of the Human Body
          </v-card-title>
          <v-card-text>
            <canvas ref="canvas" style="border: 1px solid black;"></canvas>
          </v-card-text>
        </v-card>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  mounted() {
    this.drawBodyModel();
    
    // Add click event listener to canvas element
    const canvas = this.$refs.canvas;
    canvas.addEventListener("click", this.onCanvasClick);
  },
  methods: {
    drawBodyModel() {
      const canvas = this.$refs.canvas;
      const ctx = canvas.getContext("2d");
      
      // Draw the head
      ctx.fillStyle = "#FFE0BD";
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.arc(200, 100, 50, 0, 2 * Math.PI);
      ctx.fill();
      
      // Draw the neck
      ctx.fillStyle = "#FFE0BD";
      ctx.fillRect(200 - 10, 150, 20, 30);
      
      // Draw the torso
      ctx.fillStyle = "#FFE0BD";
      ctx.fillRect(100, 180, 200, 200);
      
      // Draw the left arm
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(100, 200);
      ctx.lineTo(70, 240);
      ctx.lineTo(70, 300);
      ctx.lineTo(100, 280);
      ctx.closePath();
      ctx.fill();
      ctx.fillRect(70, 240, 10, 60);
      
      // Draw the right arm
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(300, 200);
      ctx.lineTo(330, 240);
      ctx.lineTo(330, 300);
      ctx.lineTo(300, 280);
      ctx.closePath();
      ctx.fill();
      ctx.fillRect(330, 240, 10, 60);
      
      // Draw the left hand
      ctx.fillStyle = "#FFE0BD";
      ctx.fillRect(55, 300, 30, 15);
      ctx.fillRect(50, 305, 5, 10);
      
      // Draw the right hand
      ctx.fillRect(315, 300, 30, 15);
      ctx.fillRect(340, 305, 5, 10);
      
      // Draw the left leg
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(150, 380);
      ctx.lineTo(150, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(110, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(110, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(150, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(150, 550);
      ctx.lineTo(170, 550);
      ctx.lineTo(170, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(210, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(210, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(170, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(170, 380);
      ctx.closePath();
      ctx.fill();
      
      // Draw the right leg
      ctx.beginPath();
      ctx.moveTo(250, 380);
      ctx.lineTo(250, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(290, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(290, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(250, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(250, 550);
      ctx.lineTo(230, 550);
      ctx.lineTo(230, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(190, 530);
      ctx.lineTo(190, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(230, 500);
      ctx.lineTo(230, 380);
      ctx.closePath();
      ctx.fill();
      
      // Draw the left foot
      ctx.fillStyle = "#6B441F";
      ctx.fillRect(95, 550, 35, 20);
      ctx.fillRect(100, 570, 10, 5);
      ctx.fillRect(120, 570, 10, 5);
      
      // Draw the right foot
      ctx.fillRect(265, 550, 35, 20);
      ctx.fillRect(270, 570, 10, 5);
      ctx.fillRect(290, 570, 10, 5);
      
      // Set the clickable areas of the body parts
      this.headArea = {x: 150, y: 50, width: 100, height: 100, label: "Head"};
      this.torsoArea = {x: 100, y: 180, width: 200, height: 200, label: "Torso"};
      this.leftArmArea = {x: 70, y: 240, width: 80, height: 60, label: "Left Arm"};
      this.rightArmArea = {x: 250, y: 240, width: 80, height: 60, label: "Right Arm"};
      this.leftHandArea = {x: 50, y: 300, width: 35, height: 15, label: "Left Hand"};
      this.rightHandArea = {x: 315, y: 300, width: 35, height: 15, label: "Right Hand"};
      this.leftLegArea = {x: 110, y: 380, width: 100, height: 170, label: "Left Leg"};
      this.rightLegArea = {x: 190, y: 380, width: 100, height: 170, label: "Right Leg"};
    },
    onCanvasClick(event) {
      const rect = event.target.getBoundingClientRect();
      const x = event.clientX - rect.left;
      const y = event.clientY - rect.top;
      
      // Check if clicked on any of the body parts
      const clickedAreas = [this.headArea, this.torsoArea, this.leftArmArea, this.rightArmArea, 
                            this.leftHandArea, this.rightHandArea, this.leftLegArea, this.rightLegArea];
      const clickedArea = clickedAreas.find((area) => {
        return x > area.x && x < (area.x + area.width) && y > area.y && y < (area.y + area.height);
      });
      
      // Show label of clicked body part
      if (clickedArea) {
        alert(`Clicked on ${clickedArea.label}`);
      }
    }
  },
  data() {
    return {
      headArea: {},
      torsoArea: {},
      leftArmArea: {},
      rightArmArea: {},
      leftHandArea: {},
      rightHandArea: {},
      leftLegArea: {},
      rightLegArea: {}
    };
  }
};
</script>
